vote.title: To Recognize Dr. J.S. Jindal for his Unwavering Dedication to Community Service and Health and to Celebrate his 90th Birthday
vote.description:
Title
 
To Recognize Dr. J.S. Jindal for his Unwavering Dedication to Community Service and Health and to Celebrate his 90th Birthday
 
Body
 
WHEREAS, Dr. J.S. Jindal has devoted his life to service, compassion, and leadership, uplifting countless individuals through his work in healthcare, education, and community empowerment; and
WHEREAS, Dr. Jindal has served the Columbus community with distinction for decades, acting as a mentor, advocate, and role model to generations of residents and leaders; and
WHEREAS, Dr. Jindal’s tireless efforts in promoting cross-cultural understanding and unity have helped build a more inclusive and connected Columbus; and
WHEREAS, Dr. Jindal has been a longtime leader and volunteer with the American Red Cross, embodying a commitment to emergency response, humanitarian relief, and lifesaving care; and
WHEREAS, he has been a fierce advocate for health equity, dedicating his time and talents to ensuring all people-regardless of background-have access to the care, dignity, and support they deserve; and
WHEREAS, on the occasion of his 90th birthday, we honor Dr. J.S. Jindal for his legacy of service and the profound, lasting impact he continues to make in our community; now, therefore,
 
BE IT RESOLVED BY THE COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF COLUMBUS: That this Council hereby recognizes Dr. J.S. Jindal for his unwavering dedication to community service and health and to celebrate his 90th Birthday.
